title.narrative: Rwanda - Energy Access and Quality Improvement Project

description.narrative: Improve access to modern energy for households, enterprises, and public institutions and enhance the efficiency of electricity services in the Republic of Rwanda.

condition.narrative: EDCL will prepare and Submit to the Association not later than forty-five (45) days after the end of each calendar quarter, interimunaudited financial reports for the Project covering the quarter, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association.
EDCL will submit annual project financial audits to the Association within six months after the end of each financial year.

The Recipient shall cause EDCL, no later than 90 days after receipt, to deposit into the Electricity Connections ContributionsAccount the cash contributions for new electricity connections related to the Project.
